description:
Draluc transforms into a bat and goes on an adventure, and John goes out by himself in the midst of a string of kidnappings.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Pisupisu Kikiippatsu / Kidnap Capriccio / Kidnap Elegy
Snif-Snif l`a échappé belle / Kidnapping – Capriccio / Kidnapping – Élégie
The Bat`s Close Call / Kidnap Capriccio / Kidnap Elegy
ピスピス危機一髪 / キッドナップ・カプリチオ / キッドナップ・エレジー
